title: Riot Points
body:
Hey, 
I've purchase an League Of Legends card from a store named EB Games. I came home and punched in the code and it said it was confirmed, so i went back on the store and my riot points didn't come in. I have tried again by closing down League of Legends and re-opening it again, went back to the store and punched in the code again yet it said code redeemed but my points haven't came in still,

replies.body:
Hey there,

Please see [this announcement](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/cLeYquE0-rp-card-redemption-issue-21042016) thread regarding the recent issue with redeeming RP cards.

If after the rollback has been applied and all pending transactions finalised you are still yet to receive your RP please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will assist you further.
this is a problem alot of us are having i'm down $75 and Riot just gives me some generic response to my ticket. still no remedy... very very very an-amused by this whole situation.
Man i was so pissed of because i wanted to buy a character for urf tomorrow
